Class WikiPageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.mybatis.spring.support.SqlSessionDaoSupport

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.intland.codebeamer.license.LicenseAware, EntityManager, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class WikiPageManager
extends AbstractEntityManagerImpl
    Business Layer wiki page management.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  WikiPageManager.ComparatorByOrdinalMap<T>
      Compares Identifiables by an "ordinals" Map which contains for each identifiable their ordinal number (relative to the parents).
      class  WikiPageManager.RelativeReference<T extends ReferableDto>
      A special ReferenceDto that identifies a ReferableDto identified by a path relative to a root ReferableDto, which is typically an artifact or a tracker item.
      static class  WikiPageManager.WikiPageComparatorByOrdinalMap
      Compares/sorts wiki pages by the ordinals stored/defined in the ordinal/position map Use this for sort the specified list according to the specified wiki page ordinals/positions.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dao.AbstractDao

      Get a Map of special ordinals/positions of wikipages (in the user/project wiki navigation tree, relative to their respective parent page) Note: By default a wikipage does not have an ordinal, unless one has been set via setWikiPageOrdinals(UserDto, ProjectDto, Map) Note: This method is using caching, so it is safe to call frequently

      • findById

        public WikiPageDto findById(UserDto user,
                   java.lang.Integer wikiPageId)
        Returns the wiki page with the given ID. It is guaranteed that it will always return a WikiPageDto instance, even if the wiki document is e.g. a "wiki note" (that is normally a ArtifactDto with FILE as type).

      • checkPaste

        public java.util.Map<WikiPageDto,WikiPageDto> checkPaste(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                UserDto user,
                                                java.util.Collection<? extends ReferenceDto<WikiPageDto>> pages,
                                                WikiPageDto destination,
                                                boolean isCopy)
                                                  throws AccessRightsException,
                                                         ArtifactNameConflictException
        Check if pasting the specified wiki pages at the specified destination would result in any naming conflicts
        Parameters:
        user - who wants to paste wiki pages
        pages - to paste
        destination - where to paste pages
        isCopy - whether the paste results in a copy (true) or move (false) operation
        Returns:
        a Map of name conflicts: Key=Page to paste, Value=existing page with same name than page to paste
        Throws:
        AccessRightsException
        ArtifactNameConflictException

      • getWikiPageOrdinals

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getWikiPageOrdinals(UserDto user,
                                                                     ProjectDto project,
                                                                     Baseline baseline)
        Get a Map of special ordinals/positions of wikipages (in the user/project wiki navigation tree, relative to their respective parent page) Note: By default a wikipage does not have an ordinal, unless one has been set via setWikiPageOrdinals(UserDto, ProjectDto, Map) Note: This method is using caching, so it is safe to call frequently
        Parameters:
        user - who wants to get the user/project wiki page ordinals
        project - is the project whose ArtifactType.PROJECT_WIKIPAGE ordinal map to get, or null, to get the user's ArtifactType.USER_WIKIPAGE ordinals
        baseline - is the optional baseline, to get the wiki page ordinals in that baseline, or null to get the current ordinals
        Returns:
        a Map of special ordinals/positions of wikipages (the Map is mutable, modifications have no affect, unless you call setWikiPageOrdinals(UserDto, ProjectDto, Map))
        Since:
        CB-6.1

      • setWikiPageOrdinals

        public void setWikiPageOrdinals(UserDto user,
                       ProjectDto project,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> ordinals)
        Assign special ordinals/positions to wikipages (in the user/project wiki navigation tree, relative to their respective parent page)
        Parameters:
        user - who wants to set the user/project wiki page ordinals (required)
        project - is the project whose ArtifactType.PROJECT_WIKIPAGE ordinals to set, or null, to set the user's ArtifactType.USER_WIKIPAGE ordinals
        ordinals - is a Map of ordinals/positions per wiki page (id), or null to delete all stored wiki page ordinals for the specified user/project
        Since:
        CB-6.1
